q: the APC, said that Mike Pence 's ability to unite the three traditional areas of conservatism- fiscal, foreign policy, and social- make him an ideal candidate for the nation's newly energized conservatives. Mike Pence describes himself as "First a Christian, then a conservative, then a Republican." He unifies fiscal, social, and national security conservatives, and will energize the conservative coalition essential to winning back The White House in 2012, Benko said in the release. posted on 01/17/2011 7:33:56 AM PST WEST/PALIN OR WEST/BACHMANN 2012.
